item.title: CookList : From idea to project to finished app
item.description: Turning an idea to side project to finished app Every developer should try to have some time to work on a side project, either to improve his development skills, or to feed his creativity hunger. That can be tough having a full time job but, the beauty of the side project is that you can work on it on your own pace. The first step is to find an idea that you would want to work on.
